meanings.definition: The position or role of a consultant.
meanings.sent1: In her new consultantships, she helps businesses improve their strategies.
meanings.sent2: He has held various consultantships in different industries over the years.
meanings.sent3: The consultantships at the firm are always in high demand.
meanings.sent4: His consultantships are like beacons of knowledge in the corporate world.
meanings.sent5: The consultantships offer valuable insights to those seeking guidance.

meanings.definition: The practice or skill of providing expert advice or guidance as a consultant.
meanings.sent1: Her consultantships involve analyzing data to offer solutions to clients.
meanings.sent2: Effective consultantships require a deep understanding of the client's needs.
meanings.sent3: His consultantships are so good, they should come with a warning label!
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, her consultantships are like gold nuggets.
meanings.sent5: The consultantships he provides are like a compass in a sea of uncertainty.
